website_summaries.verdict: Young girls with a mermaid- or underwater-themed bedroom will love this set that can be purchased for a great price.
pros: The set is even prettier than the picture and holds up well in the wash. Twin- sized
cons: The comforter isn't as soft as it implies on the outside, but it is still comfortable on the inside

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture. Very pretty. But it is made out of loud and crinkly material. This is just a comforter and pillow case. if you're looking for a warm comforter this is not it it is very thin. the underside is pretty soft but the top side is rough material. the side of the pillow case that you would lay on his also rough material and when you move your head on it it makes noise it is not very comfortable. Overall I would not say that this product is good quality but it is pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this her room is mermaids and butterflies it matched perfectly it was beyond better than what I expected. It is long and light but thick as well. I honestly thought it was going to be cheap but it wasn’t it’s for the quality it’s worth more than they charged to be honest. 💕
customer_reviews.author: ReeRee

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not a soft blanket by any means. It's very stiff due to the picture printed on it. The picture is somewhat out of focus as well. However, my daughter really wanted this mermaid set over all the others on amazon so we are keeping it. If it was up to me I would return it but, alas the kid spoke and it's staying
customer_reviews.author: S Family

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bedding set
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! My daughter saw this and decided she would rather have this than the Disney version. At first I was skeptical but compared to my other daughter's bedding (Disney version) this is much better quality and so much softer as well. Also, when she sleeps on it she is just the cutest little thing with the mermaid crown above her head.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Material feels really cheap and stiff, almost plastic like. The underside has a nicer, softer material but I'll probably be buying something better soon.
customer_reviews.author: ajmcfall

customer_reviews.title: Great value & easy to wash!
customer_reviews.text: Really great twin sized comforter! Super cute, easy to wash, and my daughter absolutely loves it. I might personally prefer fabric that was a little softer on the printed side (it makes that swishy sound when you run your nails across it), but it looks great and the underneath side has a nice soft feel. Very vibrant colors, and it seems like fabric that will wear well over time. Washed it in a regular sized machine as soon as we received it and no piling.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mattiello

customer_reviews.title: Good for the little mermaids
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture and my daughter likes it so I'm pleased. But it does imply that it's "ultra soft" & no, it's far from that, it's kind of scratchy and rough. Once I wash it with some fabric softener maybe it will be less stiff but I would still recommend this product to any Parent whose daughter is a mermaid like mine. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid bedding
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bedding! It is pretty cute! The price and pics were what got me to buy it. So glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Good Graphics Decent Softness
customer_reviews.text: VERY PRETTY... Graphic Quality is Good !kinda of rough on the top graphic side but decent softness on the bottom side... Might soften up after the 1st wash
customer_reviews.author: M J And

customer_reviews.title: Material quality not great, but still cute
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for here. It was a very cute design, and very vibrant, but the material is not as soft as you'd want for a comforter, but my 6 year old has no complaints overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the graphic on this it's even better than the picture and I was afraid I wouldn't like the colors and they wouldn't match the sheets I already bought but I love them it's amazing. My daughter picked this for her bed and it matches her sheets perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RogueWaters09

customer_reviews.title: For My Mermaid Party then for my Grandchild
customer_reviews.text: I want my adult friends to take a picture in front of the picture on the comforter before it is used on a bed for children.
customer_reviews.author: MidnightMoon

customer_reviews.title: This is the most adorable bedspread.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter feels like she lives in a fairytale every time she climbs in bed. This is the most adorable bedspread.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Very soft and light weight. It didn't fade when we washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was really suprised at how nice this was for the cost. It was soft on the underside, the printed side is a different texture but still fine. I've washed it a few times now and the color didn't run or fade and it's holding up 100%.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My SO was super nervous about this set being "used".. but it is fantastic! For the price, you cannot beat it! The conforter is a *litttle* bit stiff. As I stated though, for the price, you can't beat it! No stains or any sign of wear. The comforter and pillow case go beautifully together. My daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Feels hard!  Not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is very uncomfortable. It feels like hard paper. My girls like the design but hate the feel of it.... Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Otto

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest comforter set ever! My daughter loves it and it's even nicer than the picture portrays. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter super happy with it.same like in the pictures everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality is A+++
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and vibrant. Quality is A++. My 5yr old is obsessed with mermaids and was beyond thrilled when she saw her new bedding. I added purple bed sheets and a mermaid sequin pillow case which made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mona James

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good comforter for 5yr old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It is not that fluffy and thick but it works fine with a sheet underneath it. It is worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a bedspread and asked for this. She seems to love it and it has maintained its shape and color pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D'Agostin

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: My daughter squealed with delight when she opened this up on Christmas morning. She loves it. I was actually pleasantly surprised that it was a good quality item, and the material is soft, not the cheaply made kind.
customer_reviews.author: everydaynormalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl has been talking nonstop about being a mermaid, and wanting to live in the ocean. This comforter and pillowcase were the perfect gift to make her wishes come true. At such a great price, it was perfect. The comforter washed well, and is nice and soft on the underside. She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Soleil

customer_reviews.title: A four year olds dream bessing
customer_reviews.text: Our four year old granddaughter loves this bedding. We are very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product for twin girls bed. They'll love it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great quality

We just moved, so we are getting new bedding for each of our kids, and this was just the ticket for our youngest daughter. Great quality and the images are also fantastic.

product_meta.title: Dream Big Sea Princess Ultra Soft Microfiber 2-Piece Comforter Sham Set, Teal, Twin
product_meta.description: Color:Teal| Size:TwinYour little girl will have an enchanting underwater adventure with this Sea Princess mini comforter set! This set spotlights vibrant printed color graphics and allows your child to create her own unique look in her bedroom! The comforter features your child as a beautiful mermaid sea princess in shades of teal blue, green, pink, purple, yellow and white. The standard flanged pillow sham is highlighted by a tiara headpiece, bubbles and coral, on a blue-green background; comforter and sham reverse to solid blue-green. All components are constructed of an ultra-soft, 100% polyester "peached" microfiber fabric and are machine washable.
feature_bullets: Create your own unique look, your child will have an enchanting adventure under the sea with this printed color photo-realistic comforter and sham set
Twin set includes: 1 comforter 64"W x 86"L and 1 standard sham 20"W x 26"L
Easy care microfiber fabric; machine washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars608 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
